      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="en">Slaked lime to lime-water</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Slaked Kalk Kalk-Wasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La chaux-eau éteinte de chaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cal-água slaked do cal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Calce-acqua spenta della calce</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σβημένος ασβέστης στο ασβέστης-ύδωρ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cal-agua apagada de la cal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the process of making lime-water from slaked lime. Slaked lime is mixed with water and filtered to remove undissolved substances. The resulting solution is lime water.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beaker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">calcium hydroxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">filter paper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">funnel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lime-water</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slaked lime</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stirring rod</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Prozeß des Bildens des
Kalk-Wassers von slaked Kalk. Slaked Kalk wird mit Wasser 
gemischt und gefiltert, um unaufgelöste Substanzen zu löschen. 
Die resultierende Lösung ist Kalkwasser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le processus de faire 
la chaux-eau à partir de l'éteint chaux. L'éteint chaux est 
mélangé avec de l'eau et filtré pour retirer les substances non 
dissoutes. La solution résultante est eau de chaux.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o processo de fazer a 
cal-água do cal slaked. O cal slaked é misturado com água e 
filtrado para remover as substâncias undissolved. A solução 
resultante é água de cal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il processo di fare 
l'calce-acqua dalla calce spenta. La calce spenta è mescolata 
con acqua ed è filtrata per rimuovere le sostanze non dissolte. 
La soluzione risultante è acqua di calce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη διαδικασία το 
ασβέστης-ύδωρ από το σβημένο ασβέστη. Ο σβημένος ασβέστης
αναμιγνύεται με το ύδωρ και φιλτράρεται για να αφαιρέσει τις 
undissolved ουσίες. Η προκύπτουσα λύση είναι ύδωρ 
ασβέστη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el proceso de hacer el 
cal-agua de la cal apagada. La cal apagada se mezcla con agua y 
se filtra para quitar sustancias sin disolver. La solución que 
resulta es agua de cal.</string>
          </description>
